A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Some fans didn't like like this film because it took risks and brought this new trilogy into uncharted waters for a Star Wars film. When TFA came out\, there were cries of \"it's just a carbon copy of ANH; we want something new and fresh!\" Now\, this one comes along and delivers that on and people are complaining that \"it didn't honor the OT! Muh nostalgia!!!\"
